ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.5 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed French Onion Soup
¾ pound thinly sliced deli roast beef
4 Pepperidge Farm® Classic Soft Hoagie Rolls with Sesame Seeds
¼ cup drained hot or mild pickled banana pepper rings

cookingTips: Heat the soup and Worcestershire sauce together to create the dipping broth
Toast the rolls lightly to prevent sogginess
Layer cheese while beef is still warm so it melts perfectly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: I want to make an easy dipped roast beef sandwich with melted cheese. How do I keep the bread crispy while making it saucy?
